sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; export default function Weather() { let weatherData = { city: "Lviv", temperature: 22, date: "Tuesday 10:00", description: "Cloudy", imgUrl: "./01d.svg", humidity: 80, wind: 10 }; return (

{weatherData.city}

  • Last updated: {weatherData.date}
  • {weatherData.description}
{weatherData.temperature} °C | °F
  • Humidity: {weatherData.humidity}%
  • Wind: {weatherData.wind} km/h
); }
